desc: Empowering students through quality education in a nurturing environment.
address: 10, Station Plot, Opp. S.P. Office, Sation Plot

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.sports_desc: Our sports facilities include a basketball court, soccer field, and more.
facilities.porjector_desc: All classrooms are equipped with projectors for an enhanced learning experience.
facilities.comp_lab_desc: Our computer lab provides students with the latest technology for hands-on learning.
facilities.school_bus_desc: Safe and reliable transportation is available for all students.

achivement.title: Student Achievements
achivement.l1: First place in the inter-school science fair.
achivement.l2: Winner of the state-level basketball championship.
achivement.l3: National-level participant in the spelling bee competition.
achivement.l4: Art exhibition winner for the "Young Artists" category.
achivement.l5: Top scorer in the mathematics Olympiad.

feedback.title: Parents Feedback
feedback.fb1: The school has provided our child with a wonderful learning environment that encourages growth and curiosity.
feedback.fb2: We appreciate the dedication of the teachers and the range of activities offered to the students.
feedback.fb3: The school has excellent facilities and a great support system for students and parents alike.
